trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> 클래스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider>에서 파생된 클래스를 사용하여 사용할 검색 끝점을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider" /> class.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> 클래스는 사용자가 전달한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> 인스턴스의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> 메서드를 호출하여 서비스 검색을 위한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint>를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement>는 또한 자신을 복제해야 할 때마다 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> 메서드를 호출합니다.
